article: the cia ran a secret program for nearly eight years that aspired to kill top al-qaida leaders with specially trained assassins , but the agency declined to tell congress because the initiative never came close to bringing osama bin laden and his deputies into u.s. cross hairs , u.s. intelligence and congressional officials said monday .
